Grammar_Elements

Class WellFormednessAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grammar_Elements.WellFormednessAnalyser

  • public class WellFormednessAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assessGroupingWellformedness(java.util.List<Group> subgroups)
      Assesses whether the list of groups fit the GWFRs constraints.
      void checkBranchingWellFormedness(Branch branch, MetricalContainer metricalStructure)
      Checks to ensure that branches do not overlap
      static WellFormednessAnalyser getInstance() 
      void verifyGWFR1(java.util.List<Beat> beats)
      Verifies that the GWFR 1 rules is satisfied, which states that 'Any contiguous sequence of pitch-events, drum beats, or the like can constitute a group, and only contiguous sequences can constitute a group.' Ensures that all the groups only span contiguous Beats objects.
      void verifyGWFR2(MetricalContainer metricalStructure, Group topLevelGroup)
      Verifies whether the grouping structure fits the GWFR 2 rules that states 'A piece constitutes a group'.
      void verifyGWFR5(java.util.List<Group> subgroups)
      Verifies that the given list of Group objects fits the GWFR 5 rule constraint, which is stated as 'If a group G1 contains a smaller group G2, then G1 must be exhaustively partitioned into smaller groups.' Each HighLevelGroup must map more than one group.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WellFormednessAnalyser getInstance()

      • verifyGWFR2

        public void verifyGWFR2(MetricalContainer metricalStructure,
                        Group topLevelGroup)
        Verifies whether the grouping structure fits the GWFR 2 rules that states 'A piece constitutes a group'. The grouping structure should map the whole metrical structure.
        Parameters:
        metricalStructure - the metrical structure to check
        topLevelGroup - the grouping structure to verify

      • checkBranchingWellFormedness

        public void checkBranchingWellFormedness(Branch branch,
                                         MetricalContainer metricalStructure)
        Checks to ensure that branches do not overlap
        Parameters:
        branch - the top branch of the branching structure
        metricalStructure - the metrical structure for use in checking crossing branches

      • verifyGWFR1

        public void verifyGWFR1(java.util.List<Beat> beats)
        Verifies that the GWFR 1 rules is satisfied, which states that 'Any contiguous sequence of pitch-events, drum beats, or the like can constitute a group, and only contiguous sequences can constitute a group.' Ensures that all the groups only span contiguous Beats objects.
        Parameters:
        beats - the span of contiguous beats mapped by the grouping structure

      • assessGroupingWellformedness

        public void assessGroupingWellformedness(java.util.List<Group> subgroups)
        Assesses whether the list of groups fit the GWFRs constraints.
        Parameters:
        subgroups - all the groups to be checked

      • verifyGWFR5

        public void verifyGWFR5(java.util.List<Group> subgroups)
        Verifies that the given list of Group objects fits the GWFR 5 rule constraint, which is stated as 'If a group G1 contains a smaller group G2, then G1 must be exhaustively partitioned into smaller groups.' Each HighLevelGroup must map more than one group.
        Parameters:
        subgroups - the list of groups to check
